meanings.definition: Not engaged in a specified profession or occupation.
meanings.sent1: She preferred a nonprofessional approach to painting, just doing it for fun.
meanings.sent2: The event was organized by a nonprofessional group of volunteers.
meanings.sent3: It was a nonprofessional attempt at baking a cake, but it turned out surprisingly delicious.
meanings.sent4: Her nonprofessional attitude towards gardening led to a beautiful, wild garden.
meanings.sent5: The nonprofessional artist's work was full of raw emotion and authenticity.

meanings.definition: Not belonging to or characteristic of a profession.
meanings.sent1: The nonprofessional attire of the attendees made the event feel casual and relaxed.
meanings.sent2: His nonprofessional behavior at the meeting was frowned upon by the senior staff.
meanings.sent3: The nonprofessional decor of the restaurant gave it a cozy, homely feel.
meanings.sent4: She had a nonprofessional approach to cooking, relying on instinct rather than recipes.
meanings.sent5: The nonprofessional nature of the production gave it a charming, amateurish quality.
